Description:
You reach the summit of the volcano and the obelisk of Velkratah is a few meters in front of you crossing a rocky path in the lava.

When you take a few steps on the path, a giant lava elemental appears, it is an Elemental Lord.

Ignidoh, the Elemental Lord, seems to be guarding the path to the obelisk and does not attack you immediately, when you retreat he plunges back into the lava.
DescriptionAction: If you want to advance you will have to face Ignidoh.
